structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Administrative regulations governing secure juvenile detention facilities.

text.section: Administrative regulations promulgated under this section shall specifically identify new requirements of the law which increase the cost of operating a juvenile facility not operated by the Department of Juvenile Justice. The administrative regulations shall identify the amount and source of funding for compliance with the new requirements.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 131, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 173, effective July 1, 1987.
